name: Queso Blanco and Black Bean Slow Cooker Dip
author: From the Kitchen at Johnsonville Sausage
summary: Perfect for your next game day gathering, this recipe combines the great flavors of jalapeno and cheddar smoked sausage, black beans, and salsa verde. All it takes is a few simple steps to create a creamy, crowd-pleasing dip. If desired, garnish with jalapenos, tomatoes, cilantro, or a squeeze of fresh lime juice.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package Johnsonville® Jalapeno and Cheese Smoked Sausage, finely diced
1 (15 ounce) can BUSH'S® Black Beans, drained and rinsed
directions: In a large bowl, blend softened cream cheese and sour cream until smooth
Add diced sausage, black beans, shredded cheese, salsa, and garlic; mix gently to combine
Cover and cook on LOW for 2 1/2 hours, or until heated through, stirring every 30 minutes
Reduce heat to WARM to hold for serving
If desired, garnish with jalapenos, tomatoes, cilantro, or a squeeze of fresh lime juice
